name: Jillian Wagner
text: I rarely order pizza out but if I do it's definitely. Papa John's in altus. Not only is the food good but the service is amazing. Ryan who is the manager at this location always makes sure I'm taken care of and if there was ever an issue he …More

name: Honest Reviewer
text: Ordered time and time again and they still cannot get my order right. Tonight they really crossed the line with us. Ordered a 2 liter Pepsi and a pizza, we didn't have extra sauce which we expected, and the 2liter never showed up, called …More

name: jenn jones
text: Pizza was HORRIBLE. Price was ok, but a simple hamburger pizza and I couldn't even finish a single slice. Took it home and my dog would not even eat it. Had good pizza from there when it first opened, but hadn't been there in a long time. Don't know what the deal was, but won't be returning.

name: Oscar Fernandez
text: Terrible! A single employee attending all orders. I had to wait 65 minutes for my order to be ready. On top of that, they had not Pepsi. A chain that promotes and sells only that brand of soda, it is inconceivable that it runs out, without re-stocking

name: Ryan Austin
text: Great pizza but it’s INSANE to charge extra for a little pack of seasoning. $.42?!? $.75 for garlic butter!?? I asked for one pack of seasoning AFTER I left a tip. Nope! Gotta pay for it. Never coming back.

name: Robert Brummett
text: Pizza taste awful skimpy topings. The ones i seen. Dont waste your money

name: Sheylo MF
text: Really good pizza. Love their pull up cinnamon rolls.

name: Julia Leyja
text: Went to pick up pizza girl at the window was busy clocking out but managed a quick your pizza is still in the oven. 15 minutes later I was aknowleged with a what's your name then walked off ( total of 40 minutes now since I place my online …More

name: Christine Harris
text: Fresh and Delicious, haven't had Papa John's in years and this location did not disappoint, yummy.

name: Mewe Dwerwer
text: Drive to Walmart but a pizza cook it eat it and that will still be faster then delivery.

name: Charles Dobbs
text: Hot pie.  Quick service.

name: Laura August
text: I never order papa johns.but i did this past monday..i have been sick since then..throwing up...diarrhea....stomach pain...its called food poisoning.now i hate any kind of pizza.i hate hospitals even thou i should go.im weak cant eat or …More

name: Edward Griffin
text: Every easy, made an order and in ten minutes I was out.

name: NightDriven En7
text: I have only had one somewhat bad experience, and that was recently of trying to get them to FINISH a delivery that still - two days later - has not been finished after several calls. While I know they are busy, it shouldn't be that hard to …More

name: Bianca Vaughn
text: Always fast service and deliveries.

name: Michael Wallace
text: Made my way love papa johns

name: Justin Miller
text: This is one of the cleanest kitchens businesses I have ever been in or around! The crew at Papa Johns Justin and  AJ are always polite and courteous! This is a locally owned business that gives a ton back to the city of Altus!

name: Kris Hewgley
text: Lemme tell all y'all something, the people at this PJ's know what's up. Food is always perfect and outstanding, and the service has me smiling everytime. Rock on

name: Tommy Creppel
text: Good place to get pizza fast service

name: Linda Lara
text: Great ppl and Great pizza. We had a Grilled Chicken Club pizza and it was Great.

name: Dar Fipps
text: "MILITARY APPRECIATION 50%-OFF" should be more specific...ordered and just got 50% off a  order of 2nd pizza not on whole order, by the way we order 2-lrg. pizza,  bread and wings/cookie pizza..FOOF GREAT/AWESOME WITH DELIVERY SERVICE TOO, BUT ADVERTISEMENT POOR IN DETAIL
